itemInfo.itemDesc: A Trade Item containing 10 Dried Croakers.

item.name: Dried Croaker
item.desc: A dried croaker obtained through Drying. It can be Crafted into a Trade Item at a Workbench.\n※ Drying decreases the value of the fish.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
